sn51.15:1.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā ānando kosambiyaṃ viharati ghositārāme.
sn51.15:1.3: Atha kho uṇṇābho brāhmaṇo yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā ānandena saddhiṃ sammodi.
sn51.15:1.4: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho uṇṇābho brāhmaṇo āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca:
sn51.15:1.5: “kimatthiyaṃ nu kho, bho ānanda, samaṇe gotame brahmacariyaṃ vussatī”ti?
sn51.15:2.1: “Atthi pana, bho ānanda, maggo atthi paṭipadā etassa chandassa pahānāyā”ti?
sn51.15:2.2: “Atthi kho, brāhmaṇa, maggo, atthi paṭipadā etassa chandassa pahānāyā”ti.
sn51.15:3.1: “Katamo pana, bho ānanda, maggo katamā paṭipadā etassa chandassa pahānāyā”ti?
sn51.15:3.6: ayaṃ kho, brāhmaṇa, maggo ayaṃ paṭipadā etassa chandassa pahānāyā”ti.
sn51.15:4.1: “Evaṃ sante, bho ānanda, santakaṃ hoti no asantakaṃ.
sn51.15:4.3: “Tena hi, brāhmaṇa, taññevettha paṭipucchissāmi. Yathā te khameyya tathā taṃ byākareyyāsi.
sn51.15:4.6: Tassa te ārāmagatassa yo tajjo chando so paṭippassaddho”ti?
sn51.15:4.9: Tassa te ārāmagatassa yaṃ tajjaṃ vīriyaṃ taṃ paṭippassaddhan”ti?
sn51.15:4.12: Tassa te ārāmagatassa yaṃ tajjaṃ cittaṃ taṃ paṭippassaddhan”ti?
sn51.15:4.15: Tassa te ārāmagatassa yā tajjā vīmaṃsā sā paṭippassaddhā”ti?
sn51.15:5.1: “Evameva kho, brāhmaṇa, yo so bhikkhu arahaṃ khīṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano sammadaññāvimutto, tassa yo pubbe chando ahosi arahattappattiyā, arahattappatte yo tajjo chando so paṭippassaddho;
sn51.15:5.2: yaṃ pubbe vīriyaṃ ahosi arahattappattiyā, arahattappatte yaṃ tajjaṃ vīriyaṃ taṃ paṭippassaddhaṃ;
sn51.15:5.3: yaṃ pubbe cittaṃ ahosi arahattappattiyā, arahattappatte yaṃ tajjaṃ cittaṃ taṃ paṭippassaddhaṃ;
sn51.15:5.4: yā pubbe vīmaṃsā ahosi arahattappattiyā, arahattappatte yā tajjā vīmaṃsā sā paṭippassaddhā.
sn51.15:5.6: iti evaṃ sante, santakaṃ vā hoti no asantakaṃ vā”ti?
sn51.15:6.1: “Addhā, bho ānanda, evaṃ sante, santakaṃ hoti no asantakaṃ.
sn51.15:6.2: Abhikkantaṃ, bho ānanda, abhikkantaṃ, bho ānanda.
sn51.15:6.3: Seyyathāpi, bho ānanda, nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya, paṭicchannaṃ vā vivareyya, mūḷhassa vā maggaṃ ācikkheyya, andhakāre vā telapajjotaṃ dhāreyya: ‘cakkhumanto rūpāni dakkhantī’ti; evamevaṃ bhotā ānandena anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito.
sn51.15:6.4: Esāhaṃ, bho ānanda, taṃ bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca.
sn51.15:6.5: Upāsakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ ānando dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatan”ti.
